#summary Internal representation of fuzzy objects
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Introduction =

The internal representation of NulFuzzyObj are a !JavaScript object that have these :

== properties ==

|| object || JsNulObj || The representation of the object ||
|| knowledge || JsNulKlg || The knowledge restricting the values `object` can take ||

== methods ==

|| minXst || function() || Function returning the minimum possible fixed values. ||
|| maxXst || function() || Function returning the maximum possible fixed values. ||
|| fixed || function() || Function returning weither the existence is strictly one ({{{fixed = 1==minXst && 1==maxXst}}}). ||
